channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Growth round bole of tree, 27th June
item.description:
The foliage round the bottom of this tree on Lansdown Road is obscuring the view of cars on the inside lane coming past the Texaco filling station and into town. If it could be cut back I believe the problem will be sorted and less dangerous for people trying to cross the road from the Lansdown pub side. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road surface in Bournside Road, 27th June
item.description:
A number of small deep holes are causing problems, particularly for cyclists, in the road outside number 1 Bournside Road. See photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Croft Bournside Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge Pothole Previously reported - NOTHING Done!, 26th June
item.description:
The location is Westdown Carpark in the AONB - a well used area for access to Cleeve Common. This Pothole has gotten larger and deeper and vehicles are likely to be damaged sooner or later. Please can it be filled in as soon as possible - there is even some hardcore flytipped in the area that could be used!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Intrusive street lighting into garden and living room, 25th June
item.description:
Intrusive street lighting into garden and living room. There are two street lights service in a car park area behind the house is a Cottonwood Grove. They seem to be very bright and on until the early hours shining through our windows at night. Is it possible to have some Downlighting on them so they’re not so bright into the gardens?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Cottonwood Grove, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very noisy neighbour, 25th June
item.description:
Music so loud, all windows closed in this heat ant still hear every beat and every word. Daughter unable to sleep
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Somerset Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees and hedges overgrown, 25th June
item.description:
Trees and hedges overgrown on the cycle path next to A417. Not enough room for cyclists and walkers to pass safely. There will be an accident as the view is obscured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Barnwood
